attributes.action: To put in hand wash area and sanitizer area in all UK parks
attributes.additional_details: To stop the spread of germs and virus , so children and adults have a safe place to go and get excise.
attributes.background: I would like there to be a hand wash area and had sanitizer area in all UK parks so children and adults can be safe while playing in parks

rejection.details:
The provision of local amenities is a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to provide funding to enable local authorities in England, which are funded by the UK Government, to enable them to deploy hand washing and sanitising facilities in parks, if that's something you would like to happen.
